definition: To suspend or attach an object in a way that it is supported from above, often by a hook or a rope. This word is commonly used to describe the action of placing something on a higher surface or fixing it to a wall or ceiling.

examples.german: Ich hänge das Bild an die Wand.
examples.english: I hang the picture on the wall.

examples.german: Die Wäsche hängt draußen zum Trocknen.
examples.english: The laundry is hanging outside to dry.

examples.german: Er hängt gerne mit seinen Freunden ab.
examples.english: He likes to hang out with his friends.
The coat is hanging in the closet.
The lamp is hanging too high.
